title: @Riot, am I even eligible for Pool Party rewards?
body: Admittedly I've been a bit more ragey than usual, but I don't know what you classify as 'excessive' negative behaviour? On the spectrum of toxicity I'm still a long way from the more extreme end relative to some of the people I've encountered.

replies.body: If you've been in a low priority queue, you're fucked. Otherwise you're good.
